pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with YouTube CEO Susan Wojcicki | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau met today with the CEO of YouTube, Ms. Susan Wojcicki.

The Prime Minister expressed his appreciation for Google and YouTube’s continued investment in Canada and looked forward to further collaboration.

The Prime Minister and Ms. Wojcicki discussed a range of issues in relation to women’s empowerment, including how to promote women in business leadership.

Prime Minister Trudeau acknowledged Ms. Wojcicki’s leadership on increasing support for working parents, a priority he shares.
